trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of settings that customize the behavior that <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate*> will exhibit.
trans-unit.target: 表示自定义行为的设置的集合，<xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate*>会展示出。</xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate*>

trans-unit.source: It also enables the activity user to apply policy constraints to a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 它还使活动用户将策略约束应用于工作流。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Validation.ValidationSettings"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.Validation.ValidationSettings"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of type-constraint pairs.
trans-unit.target: 获取类型 / 约束对的字典。

trans-unit.source: Each additional constraint added to the dictionary will be applied to every activity of the specify type in the workflow to validate.
trans-unit.target: 向字典中添加每个附加约束将应用于工作流中指定类型，来验证每个活动。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary type list of constraints and types.
trans-unit.target: 字典类型约束和类型的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cancellation token used to notify should the activity be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用来通知应取消活动的取消标记。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token used to notify should the activity be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 用于通知应取消活动的取消标记。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the environment of variables and arguments associated with this validation settings.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置变量和自变量与此验证设置关联的环境。

trans-unit.source: The environment of variables and arguments associated with this validation settings.
trans-unit.target: 变量和参数与此验证设置关联的环境。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the additional validation constraints are to be used exclusively to validate the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否要以独占方式用于验证工作流的其他验证约束。

trans-unit.source: If set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, all the validation contained inside the activity itself will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，将在活动自身中包含的所有验证将被都忽略。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A> is called whenever a workflow is executed, and and any resulting errors will cause a <xref:System.Activities.InvalidWorkflowException> to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A>每当执行工作流时，就会调用和产生的任何错误将导致<xref:System.Activities.InvalidWorkflowException>引发。</xref:System.Activities.InvalidWorkflowException></xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the additional constraints are to be used exclusively; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果要以独占方式; 使用的其他约束否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this instance is prepared for runtime.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此实例是否已做好运行时。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if this instance is prepared for runtime; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果此实例做好运行时;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the supplied activity and all the children and sub-children of the supplied activity are validated, or if the validator should validate only to the supplied activity.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否对提供的活动和所有的子级和所提供活动的孙级进行验证，或如果验证程序应只验证到提供的活动。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an element is being validated without validating its child elements; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the element and its children and sub-children are being validated.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果某个元素正在验证而无需验证及其子元素;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果元素及其子级和孙级进行正在验证。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the root configuration is not subject for validation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示根配置是否不是使用者进行验证。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the root configuration is not subject for validation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果根配置不进行验证;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
